EN: A nice grandma to bake more cookies.
ydZH: 一个漂亮的奶奶烘烤饼干。

EN: Grows cookie plants from cookie seeds.
Mines out cookie dough and chocolate chips.
ydZH: 矿山饼干面团和巧克力。

EN: Brings in fresh cookies from the cookie planet.
ydZH: 带来新鲜的曲奇饼干的星球。

EN: Opens a door to the Cookieverse.
Brings cookies from the past, before they were even eaten.
Condenses the antimatter in the universe into cookies.
ydZH: 凝结的反物质宇宙成饼干。

EN: The mouse gains +1 cookie per click.Cursors gain +0.1 base CpS.prod prod
ydZH: 每点击鼠标收益1饼干。CpS游标获得0.1基地。戳戳

EN: The mouse and cursors are twice as efficient.it... it hurts to click...

EN: The mouse and cursors are twice as efficient.Look ma, both hands!
ydZH: 鼠标光标是两倍效率。看马

ydZH: 鼠标和游标获得0.1每个non-cursor对象owned.clickity饼干

ydZH: 鼠标和游标获得10为每个non-cursor对象owned.clickityclickityclickityclickity饼干

EN: Grandmas gain +0.3 base CpS.RE:RE:thought you'd get a kick out of this ;))

EN: Grandmas are twice as efficient.Just what you kneaded.
ydZH: 奶奶是两倍效率。只是你捏。

EN: Farms gain +1 base CpS.Rake in the dough!
ydZH: CpS农场获得1基地。在面团耙!

EN: Farms are twice as efficient.It's chocolate, I swear.
ydZH: 农场的两倍效率。这是巧克力

EN: Farms are twice as efficient.A relative of the breadfruit.
ydZH: 农场的两倍效率。一个相对的面包果。

EN: Factories are twice as efficient.Cheaper, healthier workforce.
Factories are twice as efficient.Slackers will be terminated.

EN: Mines gain +10 base CpS.A pink, volatile gas, found in the depths of some chocolate caves.
ydZH: CpS矿山获得10个基地。一个粉红色的

EN: Mines are twice as efficient.You're in deep.
ydZH: 矿山是两倍效率。你在深。

EN: Mines are twice as efficient.Finally caved in?
ydZH: 矿山是两倍效率。终于屈服了吗?

EN: Shipments gain +30 base CpS.If you removed your space helmet, you could probably smell it!(Note : don't do that.)
ydZH: CpS出货量增加30基地。如果你删除你的太空头盔

EN: Shipments are twice as efficient.By using these as shortcuts, your ships can travel much faster.
ydZH: 装运的两倍效率。通过使用这些快捷键

EN: Shipments are twice as efficient.Come back soon!
ydZH: 装运的两倍效率。很快回来!

EN: Alchemy labs gain +100 base CpS.Actually worth a lot of mony.炼金室基础cps+100<实际上相当超值>

EN: Alchemy labs are twice as efficient.Extracted through the 5 ancient steps of alchemical baking.
ydZH: 炼金术实验室两倍效率。通过提取5古代炼金术烘焙的步骤。

EN: Alchemy labs are twice as efficient.The purest form of cacao.
ydZH: 炼金术实验室两倍效率。可可的纯粹的形式。

EN: Portals gain +1,666 base CpS.A strange slab of peanut brittle, holding an ancient cookie recipe. Neat!
Portals are twice as efficient.ARISE, MY MINIONS!
Portals are twice as efficient.So I just sign up and get more cookies? Sure, whatever!
ydZH: 门户是两倍效率。所以我只是注册并获得更多的饼干?确定

EN: Time machines gain +9,876 base CpS.Bake to the future.
Time machines are twice as efficient.No more fooling around with your own grandmother!
ydZH: 时间机器效率的两倍。不再摆弄起自己的祖母!

EN: Time machines are twice as efficient.There is only one constant, and that is universal uncertainty.Or is it?
ydZH: 时间机器效率的两倍。只有一个常数

EN: You gain more CpS the more milk you have.meow may I help you
ydZH: 你获得更多的CpS牛奶越多。猫叫我可以帮助你

EN: You gain more CpS the more milk you have.meow meow meow meow
ydZH: 你获得更多的CpS牛奶越多。喵喵喵喵

EN: Cookie production multiplier +5%.No raisin to hate these.
Cookie production multiplier +5%.Get yourself some jam cookies!
Cookie production multiplier +5%.I know what you'll say. It's just cocoa butter! It's not real chocolate!Oh please.
Cookie production multiplier +10%.DOUBLE THE CHIPSDOUBLE THE TASTY(double the calories)
Cookie production multiplier +5%.Tasty, if a little unimaginative.

ydZH: 白巧克力澳洲坚果饼干

EN: The mouse and cursors gain +20 cookies for each non-cursor object owned.clickityclickityclickityclickityclick
ydZH: 鼠标光标获得20为每个non-cursor对象owned.clickityclickityclickityclickityclick饼干

EN: Grandmas are twice as efficient.Gets me going.
ydZH: 奶奶是两倍效率。让我走了。

EN: Farms are twice as efficient.All-natural mutations.
ydZH: 农场的两倍效率。天然突变。

EN: Factories are twice as efficient.Gives your cookies a healthy glow.
ydZH: 工厂两倍效率。给你饼干健康的光泽。

EN: Mines are twice as efficient.Pierce the heavens, etc.
ydZH: 矿山是两倍效率。皮尔斯诸天

EN: Shipments are twice as efficient.To boldly bake.
ydZH: 装运的两倍效率。大胆地烤。

EN: Alchemy labs are twice as efficient.Adding this to the cookie mix is sure to make them even more addictive!Perhaps dangerously so.Let's hope you can keep selling these legally.
ydZH: 炼金术实验室两倍效率。这个添加到饼干混合肯定会让他们更容易上瘾!也许是危险的。希望你可以继续销售这些法律。

EN: Portals are twice as efficient.We can change if we want to.We can leave our brains behind.
ydZH: 门户是两倍效率。如果我们希望我们可以改变。我们可以留下我们的大脑。

EN: Time machines are twice as efficient.What happened, happened.
ydZH: 时间机器效率的两倍。发生了什么事

EN: Golden cookies appear twice as often and stay twice as long.Oh hey, a four-leaf penny!
ydZH: 金色的饼干出现两倍和两倍长。哦嘿

EN: Golden cookies appear twice as often and stay twice as long.What joy! Seven horseshoes!
ydZH: 金色的饼干出现两倍和两倍长。什么快乐!七马蹄铁!

EN: You gain more CpS the more milk you have.meow meow meow meow, sir
Cookie production multiplier +15%.These absorb light so well you almost need to squint to see them.
Cookie production multiplier +15%.These dazzling cookies absolutely glisten with flavor.
Grandmas are twice as efficient.A nice farmer to grow more cookies.
ydZH: 奶奶是两倍效率。一个农民种植更多的饼干。

EN: Grandmas are twice as efficient.A nice worker to manufacture more cookies.
ydZH: 奶奶是两倍效率。一个很好的工人生产更多的饼干。

EN: Grandmas are twice as efficient.A nice miner to dig more cookies.
ydZH: 奶奶是两倍效率。一个矿工挖更多的饼干。

EN: Grandmas are twice as efficient.A nice thing to... uh... cookies.
ydZH: 奶奶是两倍效率。件好事……嗯…饼干。

EN: Grandmas are twice as efficient.A nice golden grandma to convert into more cookies.
ydZH: 奶奶是两倍效率。一个漂亮的金奶奶转换成更多的饼干。

EN: Grandmas are twice as efficient.a NiCe GrAnDmA tO bA##########
ydZH: 奶奶是两倍效率。英航的好奶奶

EN: Grandmas are twice as efficient.A nice grandma's nice grandma to bake double the cookies.
ydZH: 奶奶是两倍效率。一个漂亮的奶奶的好奶奶烤曲奇饼的两倍。
宾戈游戏中心/研究机构

EN: Grandma-operated science lab and leisure club.Grandmas are 4 times as efficient.Regularly unlocks new upgrades.What could possibly keep those grandmothers in check?...Bingo.
ydZH: Grandma-operated科学实验室和休闲俱乐部。奶奶是4倍。定期打开新的升级。可能抑制那些祖母什么?……宾果。

EN: [Research]Cookie production multiplier +1%.Computer-designed chocolate chips. Computer chips, if you will.
[Research]Cookie production multiplier +2%.Now more aerodynamic than ever!
[Research]Grandmas are twice as efficient.The result of years of scientific research!
ydZH: [研究]奶奶是两倍效率。多年的科学研究的结果!

EN: [Research]Cookie production multiplier +3%.Powered by science, of course!
[Research]Each grandma gains +1 base CpS for every 50 grandmas.Note : the grandmothers are growing restless. Do not encourage them.We are one. We are many.
ydZH: [研究]每个奶奶收益1基地CpS每50个奶奶。注意:祖母越来越焦躁不安。不鼓励他们。我们是一体的。我们有很多。

EN: [Research]Cookie production multiplier +4%.You'll go crazy over these!

[Research]Each grandma gains another +1 base CpS for every 50 grandmas.Note : proceeding any further in scientific research may have unexpected results. You have been warned.We fuse. We merge. We grow.
ydZH: [研究]每一个奶奶收益1基地CpS每50个奶奶。注意:进行任何进一步的科学研究可能意想不到的结果。我已经警告过你了!我们融合。我们合并。我们成长。

EN: [Research]Cookie production multiplier +5%.Tastes like insects, ligaments, and molasses.
[Research]Each grandma gains +1 base CpS for every 20 portals.Note : this is a bad idea.squirm crawl slither writhetoday we rise
ydZH: [研究]每个奶奶收益1基本CpS每20门户。注意:这是一个坏主意。蠕动爬行爬writhetoday我们上升

EN: [Repeatable]Contains the wrath of the elders, at least for a while.This is a simple ritual involving anti-aging cream, cookie batter mixed in the moonlight, and a live chicken.
Clicking gains +1% of your CpS.Slightly squeaky.
Clicking gains +1% of your CpS.Click like it's 1349!
Clicking gains +1% of your CpS.Heavy, but powerful.
Clicking gains +1% of your CpS.You could cut diamond with these.
Cookie production multiplier +15%.Look to the cookie.
The mouse and cursors gain +100 cookies for each non-cursor object owned.man, just go click click click click click, it's real easy, man.
ydZH: 鼠标和游标获得100年为每个non-cursor对象owned.man饼干

EN: Golden cookies appear really often.That's entirely too many.
ydZH: 金色的饼干真的经常出现。完全的太多了。

EN: [Switch]Puts a permanent end to the elders' wrath, at the price of 5% of your CpS.This is a complicated ritual involving silly, inconsequential trivialities such as cursed laxatives, century-old cacao, and an infant.Don't question it.
ydZH: (开关)将永久结束长老的愤怒

EN: [Switch]You will get 5% of your CpS back, but the grandmatriarchs will return.weriseagain
Golden cookie effects last twice as long.You've been up all night, haven't you?
ydZH: 金饼影响最后的两倍长。你一整夜

EN: Elder pledge last twice as long.These are mostly for spreading the anti-aging cream.(and accessorily, shortening the chicken's suffering.)
ydZH: 老人承诺最后的两倍长。这些对于信息的传播主要是抗衰老霜。(和附属地

EN: Cookie production multiplier +15%.True to their name.
Cookie production multiplier +15%.If it ain't dutch, it ain't much.
Cookie production multiplier +15%.Not to be confused with macarons.These have coconut, okay?
Can toggle upgrades on and off at will in the stats menu.Can also come in handy to unsee things that can't be unseen.
ydZH: 可以切换升级，在统计菜单。也可以派上用场unsee不能看不见的东西。

EN: Cookie production multiplier +15%.For your growing cookie empire, of course!
Cookie production multiplier +15%.Yes, quite riveting indeed.
Round british tea biscuits with heart motif
Cookie production multiplier +15%.Yes, quite riveting indeed, old chap.
Round chocolate british tea biscuits with heart motif
ydZH: 英国茶饼干巧克力心图案

EN: Antimatter condensers gain +99,999 base CpS.Sweet firm bosons.
Antimatter condensers are twice as efficient.Reveals new insight about the true meaning of baking cookies (and, as a bonus, the structure of the universe).
ydZH: 反物质冷凝器效率的两倍。揭示了新的认识关于烘焙饼干(和的真正含义

EN: Antimatter condensers are twice as efficient.How singular!
ydZH: 反物质冷凝器效率的两倍。多么奇异!

EN: Antimatter condensers are twice as efficient.And that's how it all began.
ydZH: 反物质冷凝器效率的两倍。这就是这一切是如何开始的。

EN: Grandmas are twice as efficient.A mean antigrandma to vomit more cookies.(Do not put in contact with normal grandmas; loss of matter may occur.)
ydZH: 奶奶是两倍效率。一个意味着antigrandma吐更多的饼干。(不要把接触正常的奶奶，损失可能发生的事。)

EN: Cookie production multiplier +20%.Palmier than you!Yes, I just said that.
Cookie production multiplier +20%.You could probably play hockey with these.I mean, you're welcome to try.
Cookie production multiplier +20%.The name implies they're made of sand. But you know better, don't you?
You gain more CpS the more milk you have.my purrpose is to serve you, sir
ydZH: 你获得更多的CpS牛奶越多。我的purrpose为您服务

EN: The mouse and cursors gain +200 cookies for each non-cursor object owned.sometimesthings justclick
ydZH: 鼠标和游标获得每个non-cursor对象拥有200饼干。sometimesthings justclick

EN: Grandmas are twice as efficient.Oh... so THAT's what I've been baking.
ydZH: 奶奶是两倍efficient.Oh……这就是我一直烘烤。

EN: Farms are twice as efficient.Staring at your crops with mischievous glee.
ydZH: 农场的两倍效率。盯着你的作物的喜悦。

EN: Factories are twice as efficient.A major part of cookie recombobulation.
ydZH: 工厂两倍效率。一个饼干recombobulation的重要组成部分。

EN: Mines are twice as efficient.Questionable efficiency, but spectacular nonetheless.
ydZH: 矿山是两倍效率。有问题的效率

EN: Shipments are twice as efficient.My god. It's full of chocolate bars.
ydZH: 装运的两倍效率。我的神。它充满了巧克力。

EN: Alchemy labs are twice as efficient.Careful with the dosing - one drop too much and you get muffins.And nobody likes muffins.
ydZH: 炼金术实验室两倍效率。小心计量——一滴太多和松饼。没有人喜欢松饼。

EN: Portals are twice as efficient.This refers to the practice of merging higher dimensional universes, or 'branes', with our own, in order to facilitate transit (and harvesting of precious cookie dough).
ydZH: 门户是两倍效率。这指的是合并更高维度的宇宙

EN: Time machines are twice as efficient.Fortnights into milleniums.
ydZH: 时间机器效率的两倍。Fortnights milleniums。

EN: Antimatter condensers are twice as efficient.These can uncollision particles and unspin atoms. For... uh... better flavor, and stuff.
ydZH: 反物质冷凝器效率的两倍。这些可以uncollision粒子和unspin原子。为…嗯…更好的味道

EN: Clicking gains +1% of your CpS.These nice mice should suffice.
Cookie production multiplier +25%.Yeah. That's got a nice ring to it.
Cookie production multiplier +25%.They're the luckiest cookies you've ever tasted!
You keep producing cookies even while the game is closed.It's the most beautiful thing I've ever seen.
ydZH: 你继续生产饼干即使游戏关闭。这是我见过的最漂亮的事。

EN: Cookie production multiplier +25%.Got it all figured out.
Cookie production multiplier +25%.Because, uh... they're worth it?
Cookie production multiplier +25%.If you want to bake a cookie from scratch, you must first build a factory.
Unlocks 5% of the potential of your heavenly chips.Grants the knowledge of heavenly chips, and how to use them to make baking more efficient.It's a secret to everyone.
Unlocks 25% of the potential of your heavenly chips.Don't forget to visit the heavenly lemonade stand afterwards.
Unlocks 50% of the potential of your heavenly chips.Also sells godly cakes and divine pastries.
Unlocks 75% of the potential of your heavenly chips.They say angel bakers work there. They take angel lunch breaks and sometimes go on angel strikes.

Unlocks 100% of the potential of your heavenly chips.This is the key to the pearly (and tasty) gates of pastry heaven, granting you access to your entire stockpile of heavenly chips.May you use them wisely.
Cookie production multiplier +20%.Wanna know something spooky? You've got one of these inside your head RIGHT NOW.
Cookie production multiplier +20%.They're something strange, but they look pretty good!
Cookie production multiplier +20%.The cookies this town deserves.
Cookie production multiplier +20%.The incredible melting cookies!
Cookie production multiplier +20%.Not even pumpkin-flavored. Tastes like glazing. Yeugh.
Cookie production multiplier +20%.When you stare into the cookie, the cookie stares back at you.
Cookie production multiplier +20%.You found the recipe on the web. They do whatever a cookie can.
Subsequent research will be 10 times as fast.It's all making sense!Again!
ydZH: 后续研究将10倍。又是所有意义! !

EN: Wrinklers spawn much more frequently.You're such a pushover.
ydZH: Wrinklers产生更频繁。你这样一个软弱的人。

EN: Cookie production multiplier +20%.Whose pine is it anyway?
Cookie production multiplier +20%.Mass-produced to be unique in every way.
Cookie production multiplier +20%.It's frosted. Doubly so.
Cookie production multiplier +20%.You don't smooch under these ones. That would be the mistletoe (which, botanically, is a smellier variant of the mistlefinger).
Cookie production multiplier +20%.It's two treats in one!(Further inspection reveals the frosting does not actually taste like peppermint, but like mundane sugary frosting.)
Cookie production multiplier +20%.What do these even have to do with christmas? Who cares, ring them in!
Cookie production multiplier +20%.The prequel to future biscuits. Watch out!
Cookie production multiplier +25%.You like to bite the legs off first, right? How about tearing off the arms? You sick monster.
Cookie production multiplier +25%.Evergreens in pastry form. Yule be surprised what you can come up with.
Unlocks... something.Not a creature was stirring, not even a mouse.
ydZH: 打开……一些东西。不是一个生物是激动人心的

EN: Cookie production multiplier +15%.It turns out that the key to increased merriness, strangely enough, happens to be a good campfire and some s'mores.You know what they say, after all; the s'more, the merrier.
Cookie production multiplier +15%.A nice wobbly belly goes a long way.You jolly?
Cookie production multiplier +1%.Some of the world's worst stocking stuffing.I guess you could try starting your own little industrial revolution, or something?...
Cookie production multiplier +1%.You don't know what's worse : the embarrassingly quaint 'elf on reindeer' motif, or the fact that wearing it makes you feel like you're wrapped in a dead sasquatch.
Reindeer appear twice as frequently.Male reindeer are from Mars; female reindeer are from venison.
ydZH: 驯鹿经常出现的两倍。男性驯鹿来自火星;女性驯鹿来自鹿肉。

EN: Reindeer are twice as slow.Hope it was worth the weight.(Something something forced into cervidude)
ydZH: 驯鹿是缓慢的两倍。希望这是值得的。(被迫cervidude)

EN: Reindeer give twice as much.It's time to up the antler.
ydZH: 驯鹿的两倍。是时候鹿角。

EN: All buildings are 1% cheaper.By Santa's beard, what savings!But who will save us?
All upgrades are 5% cheaper.Watch yours-elf around elvesdroppers who might steal our production secrets.Or elven worse!
Grandmas are twice as productive.This list contains every unholy deed perpetuated by grandmakind.He won't be checking this one twice.Once. Once is enough.
ydZH: 奶奶正在生产的两倍。这个列表包含每个邪恶行为由grandmakind延续。他不会检查这个twice.Once。一次就足够了。

EN: Random drops are 10% more common.This is one bottom you can't check out.
Clicking is 10% more powerful.Some choose to help hamburger; some choose to help you.To each their own, I guess.

Cookie production multiplier +10% per Santa's levels.In the north pole, you gotta get the elves first. Then when you get the elves, you start making the toys. Then when you get the toys... then you get the cookies.

ydZH: 圣诞老人的牛奶和饼干

EN: Milk is 5% more powerful.Part of Santa's dreadfully unbalanced diet.
Reindeer spawn much more frequently.Go, Cheater! Go, Hacker and Faker!
Cookie production multiplier +50%.All buildings are 1% cheaper.All upgrades are 2% cheaper.My name is Claus, king of kings;Look on my toys, ye Mighty, and despair!
Cookie production multiplier +25%.Melty white chocolatethat says 'I *like* like you'.
Cookie production multiplier +25%.A red hot cherry biscuit that will nudge the target of your affection in interesting directions.
Cookie production multiplier +25%.A bitter lime biscuit for the lonely and the heart-broken.
Cookie production multiplier +25%.An ice-cold blueberry biscuit, symbol of a mending heart.
Cookie production multiplier +25%.A beautiful biscuit to symbolize kindness, true love, and sincerity.
Cookie production multiplier +25%.Silver icing for a very special someone you've liked for a long, long time.
Prisms gain +1,000,000 base CpS.Get rid of the grime and let more light in.Truly, truly outrageous.
Prisms are twice as efficient.Delve into untouched optical depths where even the mantis shrimp hasn't set an eye!
ydZH: 棱镜是两倍效率。深入研究不变光学深度，甚至螳螂虾没有设置!

EN: Prisms are twice as efficient.Bask into its cocoalescence.(Warning : may cause various interesting albeit deadly skin conditions.)
ydZH: 棱镜是两倍效率。晒cocoalescence。(警告:可能会引起各种有趣但致命的皮肤状况。)

EN: Prisms are twice as efficient.Remember the different grains using the handy Roy G. Biv mnemonic : R is for rice, O is for oats... uh, B for barley?...
ydZH: 棱镜是两倍效率。记住不同的谷物使用方便Roy g . Biv助记:R是大米

EN: Prisms are twice as efficient.Your prisms now receive pristine, unadulterated photons from the other end of the universe.
ydZH: 棱镜是两倍效率。你现在的棱镜得到原始

EN: Grandmas are twice as efficient.A luminous grandma to sparkle into cookies.
ydZH: 奶奶是两倍效率。一个发光的奶奶闪耀成饼干。

EN: Allows you to trigger seasonal events at will, for a price.There will always be time.
ydZH: 允许你触发季节性事件

EN: Triggers Christmas season for the next 24 hours.Triggering another season will cancel this one.'Twas the night before Christmas- or was it?
ydZH: 触发圣诞节在接下来的24小时。触发一个赛季将取消这一个。是平安夜，还是?

EN: Triggers Halloween season for the next 24 hours.Triggering another season will cancel this one.spooky scary skeletonswill wake you with a boo
ydZH: 触发万圣节赛季接下来的24小时。触发一个赛季将取消这一个。令人毛骨悚然的恐怖skeletonswill boo叫醒你

EN: Triggers Valentine's Day season for the next 24 hours.Triggering another season will cancel this one.Romance never goes out of fashion.
ydZH: 触发情人节季在接下来的24小时。触发一个赛季将取消这一个。爱情永远是一种时尚。

EN: Reset your game with 1 million cookies baked.Easy come, easy go.
ydZH: 重置你的游戏有100万饼干烤。来得

EN: Reset your game with 1 billion cookies baked.Back to square one.
ydZH: 重置你的游戏有10亿饼干烤。从头再来。

EN: Reset your game with 1 trillion cookies baked.It's been fun.
ydZH: 重置你的游戏有1万亿饼干烤。这是有趣的。

EN: Make 1 million cookies by only having clicked 15 times.
ydZH: 使100万年饼干只有15次点击。

EN: Sell a grandma.I thought you loved me.
ydZH: 卖一个奶奶。我以为你爱我。

EN: Have at least 1 of every building.
Have at least 1 of the most expensive object, 2 of the second-most expensive, 4 of the next and so on (capped at 128).
ydZH: 至少有1最昂贵的对象吗

EN: Have at least 10 of the most expensive object, 20 of the second-most expensive, 30 of the next and so on.
ydZH: 至少有10个最昂贵的对象

EN: Click really, really fast.Well I'll be!
Click 77 golden cookies.You should really go to bed.
ydZH: 点击77黄金饼干。你真的应该睡觉了。

EN: Make 1 million cookies with no cookie clicks.This kinda defeats the whole purpose, doesn't it?
ydZH: 使100万年饼干没有饼干点击。这有点违背整个目的

EN: Appease the grandmatriarchs at least once.weareeternal
Appease the grandmatriarchs at least 5 times.our mindoutlivesthe universe
Declare a covenant with the grandmatriarchs.wehavefed
Reset your game with 1 quadrillion cookies baked.There are many thingsthat need to be erased
ydZH: 重置你的游戏有1000万亿饼干烤。有很多着提需要被删除

EN: Get to 1 billion cookies baked with no upgrades purchased.
ydZH: 到10亿年购买饼干烤没有升级。

EN: Get to 1 million cookies baked in 35 minutes (with no heavenly upgrades).
ydZH: 到达100万饼干烤35分钟(没有天上的升级)。

EN: Get to 1 million cookies baked in 25 minutes (with no heavenly upgrades).
ydZH: 到达100万饼干烤25分钟(没有天上的升级)。

EN: Get to 1 million cookies baked in 15 minutes (with no heavenly upgrades).
ydZH: 到100万年饼干烤15分钟(没有天上的升级)。

EN: Unlock 100% of your heavenly chips power.
You have 1 chance in 500,000 every second of earning this achievement.
Unlock every Halloween-themed cookie.Owning this achievement makes Halloween-themed cookies drop more frequently in future playthroughs.
ydZH: 打开每一个万圣节饼干。拥有这一成就让万圣节饼干下降在未来playthroughs更频繁。
打开每一个圣诞主题饼干。

EN: Own 1500 buildings.He saw the vast plains stretching ahead of him, and he said : let there be civilization.
ydZH: 自己的1500栋建筑物。他看到了巨大的平原延伸他的前面

EN: Purchase 150 upgrades.One can always do better. But should you?
ydZH: 购买150升级。人们总是可以做得更好。但是你应该吗?

EN: Have at least 200 of everything.You crazy person.
ydZH: 有至少200的一切。你疯狂的人。

EN: Why don't you visit more often?grandma
ydZH: 你为什么不经常访问奶奶

EN: News : cookie farms suspected of employing undeclared elderly workforce!
ydZH: 新闻:饼干农场涉嫌利用未申报的老年劳动力!

EN: News : cookie farms release harmful chocolate in our rivers, says scientist!
ydZH: 新闻:饼干农场释放有害的巧克力在我们的河流

EN: News : genetically-modified chocolate controversy strikes cookie farmers!
ydZH: 新闻:转基因争议罢工巧克力曲奇农民!

EN: News : free-range farm cookies popular with today's hip youth, says specialist.
ydZH: 新闻:农场自由放养的饼干受今天的时尚青年的欢迎

EN: News : farm cookies deemed unfit for vegans, says nutritionist.
ydZH: 新闻:农场饼干被认为不适合素食者

EN: News : cookie factories linked to global warming!
ydZH: 新闻:饼干工厂与全球变暖!

EN: News : cookie factories involved in chocolate weather controversy!
ydZH: 新闻:巧克力饼干工厂参与天气争议!

EN: News : cookie factories on strike, robotic minions employed to replace workforce!
News : cookie factories on strike - workers demand to stop being paid in cookies!
ydZH: 新闻:饼干工厂罢工，工人要求停止支付在饼干!

EN: News : factory-made cookies linked to obesity, says study.
ydZH: 新闻:工厂预制饼干与肥胖有关

EN: News : 423 miners dead in chocolate mine catastrophe!
ydZH: 新闻:423名矿工死于巧克力我的灾难!

EN: News : 621 miners trapped in collapsed chocolate mine!
ydZH: 新闻:621名矿工被困在倒塌的巧克力我的!

EN: News : chocolate mines found to cause earthquakes and sink holes!
ydZH: 新闻:巧克力矿山发现导致地震和沉孔!

EN: News : chocolate mine goes awry, floods village in chocolate!
News : depths of chocolate mines found to house 'peculiar, chocolaty beings'!
ydZH: 新闻:巧克力矿山深处发现奇特的房子”

EN: News : new chocolate planet found, becomes target of cookie-trading spaceships!
ydZH: 新闻:新的巧克力行星发现

EN: News : massive chocolate planet found with 99.8% certified pure dark chocolate core!
News : space tourism booming as distant planets attract more bored millionaires!
ydZH: 新闻:太空旅游蓬勃发展，遥远行星吸引更多无聊的百万富翁!

EN: News : chocolate-based organisms found on distant planet!
ydZH: 新闻:以生物发现遥远星球上!

EN: News : ancient baking artifacts found on distant planet; 'terrifying implications', experts say.
ydZH: 新闻:古代烘焙工件发现遥远的星球上，“可怕的影响”

EN: News : national gold reserves dwindle as more and more of the precious mineral is turned to cookies!
ydZH: 新闻:国家黄金储备减少，越来越多的珍贵矿物是转向饼干!

EN: News : chocolate jewelry found fashionable, gold and diamonds 'just a fad', says specialist.
ydZH: 新闻:巧克力珠宝发现时尚

EN: News : silver found to also be transmutable into white chocolate!
ydZH: 新闻:银也发现是可变形的白巧克力!

EN: News : defective alchemy lab shut down, found to convert cookies to useless gold.
ydZH: 新闻:有缺陷的炼金术实验室关闭

EN: News : alchemy-made cookies shunned by purists!
ydZH: 新闻:alchemy-made饼干都纯粹主义者!

EN: News : nation worried as more and more unsettling creatures emerge from dimensional portals!
ydZH: 新闻:国家担心随着越来越多的令人不安的生物走出维门户!

EN: News : dimensional portals involved in city-engulfing disaster!
News : tourism to cookieverse popular with bored teenagers! Casualty rate as high as 73%!
News : cookieverse portals suspected to cause fast aging and obsession with baking, says study.
ydZH: 新闻:cookieverse门户怀疑导致快速老化和对烘焙

EN: News : 'do not settle near portals,' says specialist; 'your children will become strange and corrupted inside.'
ydZH: 新闻:“不解决附近的门户

EN: News : time machines involved in history-rewriting scandal! Or are they?
ydZH: 新闻:时间机器参与history-rewriting丑闻!还是他们?

EN: News : time machines used in unlawful time tourism!
ydZH: 新闻:时光机用于非法时间旅游!

EN: News : cookies brought back from the past 'unfit for human consumption', says historian.
ydZH: 新闻:饼干从过去带回来不适合人类食用的

EN: News : various historical figures inexplicably replaced with talking lumps of dough!
ydZH: 新闻:各种历史人物莫名其妙地替换的说话的面团!

EN: News : 'I have seen the future,' says time machine operator, 'and I do not wish to go there again.'
ydZH: 新闻:“我已经看到了未来

EN: News : whole town seemingly swallowed by antimatter-induced black hole; more reliable sources affirm town 'never really existed'!
ydZH: 新闻:整个城市似乎被antimatter-induced黑洞吞噬，更可靠的来源肯定从未真正存在过的小镇!

EN: News : 'explain to me again why we need particle accelerators to bake cookies?' asks misguided local woman.
ydZH: 新闻:“向我解释了为什么我们需要粒子加速器来烤点心?“被误导的当地妇女问道。

EN: News : first antimatter condenser successfully turned on, doesn't rip apart reality!
ydZH: 新闻:首先反物质冷凝器成功打开

EN: News : researchers conclude that what the cookie industry needs, first and foremost, is 'more magnets'.
ydZH: 新闻:研究人员得出这样的结论:饼干行业需要什么

EN: News : 'unravelling the fabric of reality just makes these cookies so much tastier', claims scientist.
ydZH: 新闻:“解体的现实只会让这些cookie如此美味的

EN: News : new cookie-producing prisms linked to outbreak of rainbow-related viral videos.
ydZH: 新闻:新cookie-producing棱镜与rainbow-related爆发病毒视频。

EN: News : scientists warn against systematically turning light into matter - 'One day, we'll end up with all matter and no light!'
ydZH: 新闻:科学家警告系统将光转化为物质——‘一天

EN: News : cookies now being baked at the literal speed of light thanks to new prismatic contraptions.
ydZH: 现在新闻:饼干被烤在文字光速由于新柱状装置。

EN: News : 'Can't you sense the prism watching us?', rambles insane local man. 'No idea what he's talking about', shrugs cookie magnate/government official.
ydZH: 新闻:“你不能感觉棱镜看我们?”

EN: News : world citizens advised 'not to worry' about frequent atmospheric flashes.
ydZH: 新闻:世界公民建议“不要担心”频繁大气闪烁。

EN: News : cookie manufacturer downsizes, sells own grandmother!
It has betrayed us, the filthy little thing.grandma
It tried to get rid of us, the nasty little thing.grandma
It thought we would go away by selling us. How quaint.grandma
ydZH: 它认为我们会被出售。如何quaint.grandma

EN: I can smell your rotten cookies.grandma
News : cookie manufacturer completely forgoes common sense, lets OCD drive building decisions!
ydZH: 新闻:饼干制造商完全放弃常识

EN: News : follow the tear-jerking, riches-to-rags story about a local cookie manufacturer who decided to give it all up!
News : known universe now jammed with cookies! No vacancies!
ydZH: 新闻:已知宇宙现在挤满了饼干!没有职位空缺!

EN: News : local cookie manufacturer becomes luckiest being alive!
ydZH: 新闻:当地饼干制造商成为最幸运的活着!

EN: News : faint meowing heard around local cookie facilities; suggests new ingredient being tested.
ydZH: 新闻:微弱的喵喵声听到周围当地饼干设施;表明新成分测试。

EN: News : crowds of meowing kittens with little hard hats reported near local cookie facilities.
ydZH: 新闻:成群的喵喵声小猫没有安全帽报道当地的饼干设施附近。

EN: News : surroundings of local cookie facilities now overrun with kittens in adorable little suits. Authorities advise to stay away from the premises.
ydZH: 新闻:当地饼干设施环境现在被小猫可爱的小西装。当局建议远离前提。

EN: News : locals report troupe of bossy kittens meowing adorable orders at passersby.
ydZH: 新闻:当地居民报告剧团的专横的小猫喵喵声可爱的订单在路人。

EN: You feel like making cookies. But nobody wants to eat your cookies.
ydZH: 你觉得做饼干。但是没有人想要吃你的饼干。

EN: Your first batch goes to the trash. The neighborhood raccoon barely touches it.
ydZH: 你的第一批去垃圾。附近的浣熊几乎触及它。

EN: Your family accepts to try some of your cookies.
ydZH: 你的家人接受你的一些饼干。

EN: Your cookies are popular in the neighborhood.
ydZH: 你的饼干是受欢迎的在附近。

EN: People are starting to talk about your cookies.
ydZH: 人们开始谈论你的饼干。

EN: Your cookies are talked about for miles around.
ydZH: 你的饼干是谈到了数英里。

EN: Your cookies are renowned in the whole town!
ydZH: 你的饼干是著名的在整个小镇!

EN: Your cookies bring all the boys to the yard.
ydZH: 你的饼干给院子里带来所有的男孩。

EN: Your cookies now have their own website!
ydZH: 你的饼干现在有自己的网站!

EN: Your cookies are worth a lot of money.
ydZH: 你的饼干是值得一大笔钱。

EN: Your cookies sell very well in distant countries.
ydZH: 你的饼干在遥远的国家卖得很好。

EN: People come from very far away to get a taste of your cookies.
ydZH: 人们来自非常遥远的你的饼干。

EN: Kings and queens from all over the world are enjoying your cookies.
ydZH: 国王和王后来自世界各地正在享受你的饼干。

EN: There are now museums dedicated to your cookies.
ydZH: 现在博物馆致力于你的饼干。

EN: A national day has been created in honor of your cookies.
ydZH: 创建了一个国庆纪念你的饼干。

EN: Your cookies have been named a part of the world wonders.
ydZH: 你的饼干被命名为世界奇迹的一部分。

EN: History books now include a whole chapter about your cookies.
ydZH: 历史书现在包括整个章你的饼干。

EN: Your cookies have been placed under government surveillance.
ydZH: 你的饼干已经受到政府监控。

EN: The whole planet is enjoying your cookies!
ydZH: 整个地球正在享受你的饼干!

EN: Strange creatures from neighboring planets wish to try your cookies.
ydZH: 奇怪的生物从邻近的行星希望尝试你的饼干。

EN: Elder gods from the whole cosmos have awoken to taste your cookies.
ydZH: 老人神从整个宇宙已认识到品尝你的饼干。

EN: Beings from other dimensions lapse into existence just to get a taste of your cookies.
ydZH: 人类从其他方面陷入的存在只是为了尝到你的饼干。
你的饼干所取得的感觉。

EN: The universe has now turned into cookie dough, to the molecular level.
ydZH: 宇宙已经变成饼干面团

EN: Your cookies are rewriting the fundamental laws of the universe.
ydZH: 你的饼干是重写宇宙的基本规律。

EN: A local news station runs a 10-minute segment about your cookies. Success!(you win a cookie)
ydZH: 当地新闻站运行10分钟段你的饼干。成功!(你赢了饼干)

EN: Note:you gain milk through achievements.Milk can unlock unique upgrades over time.
ydZH: 注意:您通过成就获得牛奶。牛奶可以解锁独特的升级。
